game.name: DCS: Spitfire Beware! Beware! Campaign
game.categories: Single-player, Downloadable Content, Captions available, VR Support, Partial Controller Support
game.shortDescription: During the winter of 1942-43, the air battle raging in the skies over Europe was at its fiercest. The Focke Wulfs and Messerschmitts flown by the Luftwaffe’s ’experten’ proved to be more than a worthy foe for the RAF’s new Spitfire Mk.IX-s.
game.shortDescriptionEn: During the winter of 1942-43, the air battle raging in the skies over Europe was at its fiercest. The Focke Wulfs and Messerschmitts flown by the Luftwaffe’s ’experten’ proved to be more than a worthy foe for the RAF’s new Spitfire Mk.IX-s.
